chunks.content: Frontend Web Developer with 3 years of experience specializing in HTML , CSS , SCSS , JavaScript ,  and React.js. Skilled  in  creating  responsive, user-friendly websites and applications. Passionate about delivering highquality,  performance-driven  solutions  with  a  focus  on  clean,  maintainable code.  Strong  problem-solving  skills,  focused  on  building  scalable  and efficient applications that meet user needs.

Carelon Global Solutions is a top provider of data analytics, IT services, and  business solutions for the healthcare industry. The platform connects patients  with medical professionals to improve healthcare delivery and services.

- Designed and developed reusable AEM components using HTL ( HTML Template Language ) for scalable and maintainable code.
- Developed responsive UI screens in line with Figma designs, ensuring a seamless user experience across devices.
- Conducted thorough widget testing , identified bugs, and implemented bug fixes to ensure high-quality performance.
- Integrated external APIs and implemented data fetching and processing logic to support dynamic content.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Jira for task management and Git for version control.
- Utilized HTML , CSS , and JavaScript to develop the core web application features, optimizing for performance and accessibility.

Contributed  to  the  development  of Albertsons  MSP ,  a  web-based platform      designed  to  optimize  and  manage  various  internal  services within the   organization. The platform integrates multiple functionalities, providing a   centralized solution for employees to efficiently access and manage key   services such as procurement, support, and operations.

- Developed responsive user interfaces using JavaScript , React.js , and Redux for state management.
- Designed and implemented components with Material-UI , ensuring a modern, user-friendly experience.
- Utilized HTML5 and CSS3 to create structured, styled, and responsive web pages.
- Collaborated with backend teams to implement data fetching, user authentication, and ensure proper API integrations.
- Participated in code versioning and collaboration using Git , maintaining efficient workflows in team environments.
- Gained exposure to MVC architecture and web app deployment processes, contributing to platform launch and updates.
Company: UST Global
